name: Molnár recreation, 1.0
description: This recreated artwork is originally from Vera Molnár. I used code example from Garrit, but made some small changes, for example changed the size and layers of the rectangles.

name: Molnár recreation, 1.1
description: This recreated artwork is originally from Vera Molnár. I used code example from Garrit, but made some small changes, for example added loop and some rotation in the layers.

name: Molnár recreation, 1.2
description: This recreated artwork is originally from Vera Molnár. I used code example from Garrit, but made some small changes, for example added strokeWeight and some transparance.
